Correction: J Exp Clin Cancer Res 42, 330 (2023) https://doi.org/10.1186/s13046-023-02916-6
Following publication of the original article [1], authors noticed and error in Fig. 8. The figure was not captured and correct figure is given below:
The correction does not affect the overall result or conclusion of the article. The original article has been corrected.
Journal of Experimental & Clinical Cancer Research
†Yuanshan Yao, Chunji Chen, Jing Wang, Haojie Xuan and Xiuxiu Chen contributed equally to this work. †Dongfang Tang, Libao Gong and Wen Gao contributed equally to this work.
